author: parth0123
title: Help Needed -- 8Days Madhyapradesh tour during Dec 2015 with 3 yr old daughter
text: # 1 I'm planning 8 Days Madhyapradesh tour during Dec 2015 with 3 yr old daughter. I want to cover Khajuraho, Pancmari, kanha, jabalpur, bandhavgarh and if time permits then Sanchi. I've already have MP bound tickets upto Satna. Please help to plan the tour. Many thanks in advance.
